#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#define lld long long int
using namespace std;
inline lld abs(lld a)
{
    return (a<0)?-a:a;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    vector<lld> dp;
    vector<lld> v;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    v.resize(n+5);
    dp.resize(n+5);
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        dp[i]=1000000000;
        scanf("%lld",&v[i]);
    }
    dp[1]=dp[0]=0;
    for(int i=2;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=1;j<=i;j=j<<1)
        {
            dp[i]= min(dp[i],dp[i-j]+abs(v[i]-v[i-j]));
        }
        //printf("%lld ",dp[i]);
    }
    printf("%lld",dp[n]);
    return 0;

}
